amendment.description: To increase Veterans Medical Care by $1,200,000,000.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2846 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2846 proposed by Senator Murkowski. (consideration: CR 3/12/2004 S2673-2674; text: CR 3/12/2004 S2673) To increase Veterans Medical Care by $1,200,000,000.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2846 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2846 proposed by Senator Murkowski.
